statement.p: Vasya's initial salary is 68600. If she receives a raise of 5900 each year, what is the first year her salary is greater (or equal to) 100,000?

solution.p: Her salary must increase more than 100,000-68600 = 31400. This will take \displaystyle\frac{{31400}}{{5900}}={5.3220338983051} years. Because she won't be more than 100,000 until the final, full year that is 6 years.
